QuestData.Title: A Worthy Challenge: Darkmaster Gandling
QuestData.Description: $n, I need you to assemble a fearless group and lead them into the depths of Scholomance. Activate the Challenger's Orb, and cleanse Scholomance of Darkmaster Gandling's evil presence.$B$BReturn to me when you've completed this challenge and I shall reward you handsomely.
